top_categories.workout_context: BURGR 95 rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
BURGR 95’s wisconsin northwoods, local event demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of BURGR 95. Make this intensity feel like home.
Racing BURGR 95 isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at BURGR 95 when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
At 95 miles, BURGR 95 punishes athletes who haven’t trained their body to produce power when glycogen runs low.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for BURGR 95 — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
The varied gradients at BURGR 95 reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Every session at BURGR 95 intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what BURGR 95’s wisconsin northwoods gravel delivers on race day.
Tempo is the race-day intensity of BURGR 95. Harder than Z2, easier than threshold — the pace you’ll hold for hours on wisconsin northwoods gravel.
BURGR 95’s wisconsin northwoods gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for BURGR 95’s 95 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at BURGR 95 requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on wisconsin northwoods gravel to build confidence. Expect: wisconsin northwoods, local event, midwest gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and G Spot to prepare you for 95 miles of wisconsin northwoods gravel in Gleason, Wisconsin.
